text: Sir Denys Ambrose Williams (12 October 1929 â€“ 7 August 2014) was a Chief Justice of Barbados. He served as an acting governor-general from 19 December 1995 until 1 June 1996. Williams died in Bridgetown, Barbados from unknown causes, aged 84. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Governors-general of Barbados
title: Denys Williams
